EventDestination.description: The EventDestination schema defines the target of an event subscription, including the event types and context to provide to the target in the event payload.
EventDestination.longDescription: This resource shall represent the target of an event subscription, including the event types and context to provide to the target in the event payload.

enumDescriptions.Event: The subscription destination receives an event payload.
enumDescriptions.MetricReport: The subscription destination receives a metric report.

enumLongDescriptions.Event: The subscription destination shall receive an event payload as defined by the value of the Protocol property.
enumLongDescriptions.MetricReport: The subscription destination shall receive a metric report payload as defined by the value of the Protocol property.

title: #EventDestination.EventDestination
